title: Introduction to Science Studies: Part II
description: (Same as COGR 225D, HIGR 241, Phil 209D.) Continuing the introduction developed in Part I, this course examines recent key topics and problem situations in science studies. Emphasis is on recent theoretical perspectives and empirical studies in communication, history, philosophy, and sociology of science and technology, and the interplay between them. Prerequisites: SOCG 255A is a prerequisite for SOCG 255D; enrollment in Science Studies Program or instructor’s permission.
